#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cerr<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
long long cs,n,d,o,m,a,b,c,D,e,f;
int main()
{
  cin>>cs;
  while(cs--)
  {
    cin>>n;
    f=0;
    while(n--)
    {
      cin>>d>>o;
      m=o/d;
      a=(m+1)&1;
      b=o&1;
      if(m&1)
      {
        c=(m+1)/2&1;
        D=m&1;
        e=d&1;
      }
      else
      {
        c=m/2&1;
        D=(m+1)&1;
        e=d&1;
      }
      f=(f+a*b+c*D*e)&1;
    }
    printf("%s\n",f?"YES":"NO");
  }
	return 0;
}
